body.h1: A new version of XSLT-Tester is released!
body.p: I have added the following new features:

ul.li: XSLT 3 support when using the Saxon 9.8 HE engine
XSLT 1 in addition Xalan or Saxon 6 now also with the browser's engine
Added some links to useful W3C docs
Preview your result as HTML when doctype is set to HTML (see this example)
Preview your result as PDF when doctype is set to XML and your document starts with root element of XSL-FO. Apache FOP is used to generate the PDF
Removed Saxon 9.7 as side-by-side use of more than one Saxon 9 version had shortcomings of regular expression Unicode support
